## R Markdown

You will need to create a FRED api login.

```{r}
library(fredr); library(tidyverse); library(fpp3)
NFP <- c("PAYNSA","PAYEMS") %>% map_dfr(., fredr_series_observations) %>% mutate(YM=yearmonth(date)) %>% as_tsibble(., index=YM, key=series_id)
```

## Seasonal Adjustment?


```{r}
NFP %>% filter(YM > yearmonth("2019-01")) %>% autoplot() + labs(y="Employment in Thousands")
```
